Basecamp is a web-based project management tool launched in 2004. Its primary features are to-do lists, forum-like messaging, file sharing, and time tracking.

3 jobs Operations · Remote

Twitter is an American microblogging and social networking service on which users post and interact with messages known as "tweets".

12 jobs Marketing · Dublin

Stripe is an American technology company based in San Francisco, California. Its software allows individuals and businesses to make and receive payments over the Internet.
